name: Boxing Ball FPP
description:
BoxingBallFPP is a game about stuffing a ball on an elastic band.  The player will have to hit the ball with his fists. Audio accompaniment helps to feel the impact of the ball. With each stroke, the speed of the ball increases smoothly, and the game becomes more complicated accordingly. Bright colors and unique 3D models give the game even more charm. 

Good luck in BoxingBallFPP, dear Player!

The game is available on PC and mobile devices for free
